LanguageData.GR_GeneticAlteration.label: genetic alteration
LanguageData.GR_GeneticAlteration.description: Craft the Tissue Grinder and Genome Extractor Table to create genoframes and genomes respectively.
LanguageData.GR_GeneticEngineering.label: genetic creation
LanguageData.GR_GeneticEngineering.description: Create new hybrids with the Genomorpher, gestate them in an Electrowomb and create boosters at the Genetics Tinkering Table.
LanguageData.GR_GeneticDuplication.label: genetic duplication
LanguageData.GR_GeneticDuplication.description: Manufacture Template Genomes through the Genome Recombinator and duplicate existing Genomes.
LanguageData.GR_HybridImplantology.label: genetic augmentation
LanguageData.GR_HybridImplantology.description: Grow bio-engineered implants for hybrids and animals alike on the Implant augmentator.
LanguageData.GR_GeneticCompatibility.label: genetic compatibility
LanguageData.GR_GeneticCompatibility.description: Grow bio-engineered implants for humans on the Implant augmentator.
LanguageData.GR_GeneticMechahybridization.label: genetic mechahybridization
LanguageData.GR_GeneticMechahybridization.description: Create Biomechanical Lab beacons to find mechahybridizers, and construct mechahybrid antennas to support more mechanoid hybrids.
